title: Collection Dates
description: The date(s) when the data were physically collected.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date of the data collection period. Must be in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format with no spaces.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The end date of the data collection period. Must be in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format with no spaces.

time_frame.title: Time Frame
time_frame.description: An optional free-text description of the data collection period, used for non-numeric dates (e.g., 'Fall 2012') or to add context when multiple dates are present.
time_frame.usageNotes: The Time Frame should not simply restate the date(s) in words. For example, if the Collection Date starts in 2020-01, the Time Frame should repeat 'January 2020'.
